hero_description: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.
reason_tv_desc: Watch on smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and more.
reason_download_title: Download your shows to watch offline
reason_download_desc: Save your favourites easily and always have something to watch.
reason_watch_desc: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV.
reason_kids_desc: Send kids on adventures with their favourite characters in a space made just for them — free with your membership.
footer_Project: This is a learning project only — not affiliated with or endorsed by Netflix.
faq_a1: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries and more — on thousands of internet-connected devices.
faq_a2: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from ₹149 to ₹649 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.
faq_a3: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web or on any device that offers the Netflix app. You can also download shows for offline viewing.
faq_a4: Netflix is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks.
faq_q5: What can I watch on Netflix?
faq_a5: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.
faq_a6: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and films.
footer_ready_text: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.
footer_recaptcha_text: This is a learning project only — not affiliated with or endorsed by Netflix.
